rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Between the fee for mooring Gramps
here and for unloading your goods,
that'll be 15G in total.

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Thanks a bunch.
I dunno what I'd've done if you'd
tried to shirk your bill...

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg0006
rows.name: Enjoy your stay on Goldmund, yeah?

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Whaaaaat?!
You just came by to taunt me,
is that it?

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg0008
rows.name:
Come on, you're a salvager, I know
you can afford a measly 15G!

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg00101
rows.name: Rex, you've got a lot to be proud of.

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg00102
rows.name: Salvaging isn't exactly a stable career.

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg00103
rows.name:
Some days you might hit the jackpot,
but on an unlucky day you might not
bring in a single G.

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg00104
rows.name:
Living independently at your age in a
business like that...it can't be easy.

rows.label: tlk45300015_01_msg00105
rows.name: You just keep up the good work, yeah?
